name: Duck Doom Deluxe
summary:
“The classic NES gameplay of Duck Hunt,
The splendid brutality of Doom.
Together at last.”

Duck Doom Deluxe is the overhaul upgrade to the surprisingly popular mega-mix Duck Doom, originally released in November 2004.

Really, it's a stupid game; one that's sure to get old fast.

But if this is your first time playing, then more than likely, Duck Doom will be the most satisfying and unwittingly humorous retro gaming throwback you'll download this week.
